service_name: Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Programme Health Check
page_content:
Aphari Ltd

Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Programme Health Check

Aphari helps organisations transform their IT operating model, adopt cloud services, implement multi source delivery models, establish systems integration and service integration (SIAM) capabilities. Our healthcheck service provides validation of programme status against our integrated best practice framework throughout the transformation lifecycle – from definition, procurement, delivery to live service.

Features

  • Validation of programme status against our integrated best practice framework.
  • Assessment of scope, stakeholders, risks, roadmap, benefits, capability, sourcing, solutions.
  • Conducted by multi-disciplinary team, with extensive supply-side multi-sourced delivery experience.
  • Provides an integrated and holistic view across all programme functions.
  • ‘Big IT’ experience yet independent of suppliers and large consultancies.
  • Addresses specific concerns including parallel OJEU procurement and multi-supplier delivery.
  • Deep domain expertise across programme, technical, security, service, commercial aspects.
  • Approach based on pragmatic application of public-domain best practices.
  • Our framework includes MOP, MSP, PRINCE, COBIT, TOGAF, ITIL, P3O.
  • Can combine with other Aphari services including Set-up, Accelerators etc.

Benefits

  • Helps organisations transform their IT operating model and supply chain.
  • Enables the programme to confirm strengths and address any weaknesses.
  • Identifies key risks and issues based on 'real world' experience.
  • Highlights cross-functional inter relationships, concerns and opportunities for improvements.
  • Provide programme stakeholders with an independent, experienced point of view.
  • Highlight techniques for mitigating specific risks of multi-vendor models.
  • Helps to ensure continued viability of the programme business case.
  • No lock-in to proprietary or 'branded' methodologies.
  • Our holistic approach speaks to stakeholders in their own language.
  • Aphari provide proven techniques and knowledge to enhance programme capability.

Pricing

£950 per unit

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
